# GET /v1/gameCenterAchievementLocalizations/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAchievementImage | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterAchievementLocalizations/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAchievementImage ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievementLocalizations-_id_-relationships-gameCenterAchievementImage)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterAchievementLocalizations/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAchievementImage 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterAchievementLocalizations/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAchievementImage

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievementLocalizations-_id_-relationships-gameCenterAchievementImage#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterAchievementLocalizations/{id}/relationships/gameCenterAchievementImage
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievementLocalizations-_id_-relationships-gameCenterAchievementImage#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievementLocalizations-_id_-relationships-gameCenterAchievementImage#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterAchievementLocalizationGameCenterAchievementImageLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementlocalizationgamecenterachievementimagelinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievementLocalizations-_id_-relationships-gameCenterAchievementImage#see-also)

### [Reading achievements localizations](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-gameCenterAchievementLocalizations-_id_-relationships-gameCenterAchievementImage#Reading-achievements-localizations)

[`List all localizations for an achievement`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-localizations)Read information about the release for specific achievement.[`GET /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/localizations`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-relationships-localizations)[`Read achievement localization information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievementlocalizations-_id_)Read localized information for a specific locale for a specific achievement.[`Read the achievement localization information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievementlocalizations-_id_-gamecenterachievement)Read the achievement associated with specific localized information.[`Read the achievement ID for a localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievementlocalizations-_id_-relationships-gamecenterachievement)Read the achievement ID associated with specific localized information.[`Read the image for a specific achievement localization`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievementlocalizations-_id_-gamecenterachievementimage)Read the achievement image associated with specific localized information.
